molecular.geometry.dihedral¶

molecular.geometry.dihedral(a, b, c, d=None)[source]¶

Compute dihedral angle between four points.

TODO add equation for sanity checking

Parameters

  • a (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates. If only a, b, and c are supplied, they are taken as vectors. If d is included, they are taken as vertices.

  • b (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates. If only a, b, and c are supplied, they are taken as vectors. If d is included, they are taken as vertices.

  • c (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates. If only a, b, and c are supplied, they are taken as vectors. If d is included, they are taken as vertices.

  • d (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates. If only a, b, and c are supplied, they are taken as vectors. If d is included, they are taken as vertices.

Returns

Dihedral angle

Return type

float or numpy.ndarray
